Overview

Assessment Literacy content development via R

Installation

From CRAN

Currently there is no "stable" version of Literasee available on CRAN.
The development version of the package must be installed from github.

From Github

To install the development version of Literasee:

> devtools::install_github("CenterForAssessment/Literasee")

Usage

  • The Literasee Package Wiki contains instructions on how to prepare data and run Literasee analyses.
  • The Literasee Package Documentation contains man pages for all functions and data sets in the the Literasee Package.
  • Numerous Literasee Gists provide other examples of analyses that can be performed.

Resources

  • literasee.io
  • CRAN Repo
